Compliance description: Check if the code includes methods to collect raw data from databases, APIs, sensors, web scraping, or user inputs.
Assess if the code includes an annotation system for supervised learning tasks, such as manual or automated labeling.
Ensure the code implements oversampling, undersampling, or synthetic data generation (e.g., SMOTE).
Assess whether the code includes techniques to detect and mitigate model biases against specific groups.
Assess whether the code includes checks to maintain data quality and consistency throughout preprocessing.
Check if the code masks or anonymizes sensitive data while preserving analytical utility.
Check if the code includes mechanisms to track shifts in input data distribution.
Ensure the code monitors changes in the relationship between input features and target labels.
Verify if the code adjusts class weights or applies cost-sensitive learning methods.
